data.text: Premium Mmmmhh, premium Booooaahhh, premium Zzzzz,… lean back and enjoy our new SWISS Premium Economy clip 🎬 #SWISSPremiumEconomy #premiumeconomy #premium https://t.co/O9kzGzQDtS
Our aircraft in the most special lights of the night. ✈🌙✨ #flyswiss #repostsoftheweek #reposts https://t.co/sK6eA3Y2W7

We reduced our first-quarter operating loss by over 75% year on year to CHF -47.4 million and remain committed to our goal of achieving a ‘black zero’ breakeven earnings result for 2022. More information: https://t.co/5L0NZzaSm8

urls.title: SWISS Lounges Zurich
urls.description: We treat you to the highest comfort in the nine SWISS lounges at Zurich Airport, whether before your departure, during a transfer or on arrival. Be our guest.

data.text: The new-look SWISS Arrival Lounge at @zrh_airport opened today to welcome status customers and SWISS First and SWISS Business travellers on inbound long-haul flights. Among its highlights: a breakfast buffet, showers, bedrooms and business rooms: https://t.co/oyt4zt7PRv https://t.co/bMzaHiM7JT
"Goodbye office, hello SWISS" - that's what our Instagrammer of the month Carlos decided to do a few years ago and now he spoils our guests in First Class. He shows you how on Instagram @flyswiss.

And where are you taking off to this weekend? 🛫
#repostsoftheweek #reposts https://t.co/Tic8TDXF9S

Around the world in 111 days in an aircraft with the mission to link initiatives accelerating sustainable aviation: Diamondo Earthrounding's journey recently came to an end. We have supported them in this endeavor and are happy about their safe return: https://t.co/cAj5XQPyUN https://t.co/ZNhTRWdkpI

Happy World Pilots' Day 👩‍✈️🧑‍✈️👨‍✈️
We thank all our pilots who safely fly our guests around the world with dedication, professionalism – and a warm smile. Even in turbulent times. ✈️✈️
#WorldPilotsDay https://t.co/8ksqfrvHNT

As a result of relaxed corona regulations, we will resume our flight operation to Hong Kong which was temporarily suspended in December 2021. The first flight is scheduled for 7 May. Initially we will offer one weekly flight to the Asian metropolis. https://t.co/GH5Vro1P0W https://t.co/HjDAuhVFoa

Please note: This map is intended as an aid to inspiration and to guide your

data.text: Would you like to choose your culinary delights before your trip? With SWISS Saveurs Pre-Order, you can now decide up to 36 hours before departure which fresh products we can serve you on board and will also benefit from more favourable conditions.🥪🥗🧃✈

As of 20 April, we offer our guests a «Surprise Package» with unsold fresh food at a reduced price on flights ending their rotation. With SWISS Saveurs To Go, you can now enjoy various delicacies from our award-winning culinary concept SWISS Saveurs at more favourable conditions. https://t.co/xhvUkVWHpS
... absolutely put in the right light ✨👍 #repostsoftheweek #repost https://t.co/FhzGWd4s5U

Come along to discover our new SWISS Premium Economy in its finest detail. With our new travel class we set new benchmarks and make it first choice for guests who appreciate individuality and wish to arrive at their destination feeling even more relaxed: https://t.co/l4KAKpbudP💺 https://t.co/OezTPGPKfU

urls.title: SWISS Premium Economy
urls.description: SWISS Premium Economy is first choice for passengers who appreciate individuality and wish to arrive at their destination feeling even more relaxed. Compared to SWISS Economy you can look forward to a latest generation seat that promises more privacy, enhanced comfort and the best entertainment at an attractive price. You will love the comfortable seat, above all due to its innovative hard-shell design. You can adjust it effortlessly without disturbing your fellow passengers in the row behind you. Enjoy

data.text:
Holidays at last - carefree travel at last ✈😎🌞
However, as travel restrictions still apply to many destinations, good preparation is necessary. Also for a smooth journey at the airport & shorter waiting times. Therefore check out our Travel Briefing: https://t.co/6Jy4C02jCT https://t.co/nMJdj0PCxq

urls.title: SWISS Travel Briefing - your guide for a pleasant trip
urls.description: Entry regulations Enquire in good time about the ​ entry regulations for your destination. The authorities of some destination countries may require passengers to complete an online registration before arrival. Current flight information There can be disruptions to flight operations, especially in peak holiday season with high passenger numbers. You can find the latest advice and ​ general flight information on our dedicated page at any time. Store your contact details Store your contact details under

data.text:
Hi Damien, thank you for contacting us regarding your reservation. Please be advised your new flight schedule is as follows:

LX2395 09APR FNC - GVA 1530 2000

Please confirm so we may proceed accordingly. Kind regards,Sana. 

Kind regards, Sana.

Sustainable aviation fuels close the carbon cycle: they only emit as much CO2 upon combustion as was used to produce them. That's why they are a clean substitute for fossil fuels and that's also why we're proud to become the first airline to use @Synhelion's solar fuel. ☀️⛽️✈ https://t.co/rjotUrhp3K
An eye for detail. That is our community. Thanks for the great shots 🤩📸👏 #repostsoftheweek #repost https://t.co/v9NFi0r2Oi

Sofia, Nantes, Vilnius and Bologna – we’re celebrating four new European destinations in our summer timetable this week.🥳✈️ Which of these four destinations would you choose for your next holiday? Thank you for the warm welcome @SOFIAirport @LTairports @BLQairport https://t.co/SFWogS2VDD

Meet Nina, Maître de Cabine and our Instagrammer of the Month in April. This month on Instagram @flyswiss, she explains what duties belong to her position and she presents you one of the biggest fans of SWISS - so stay tuned😉✈️

In view of a corresponding decision by the Swiss Federal Council, we will gradually lift our mask-wearing requirement aboard from 1APR onwards. However, masks must still be worn when required by the destination. Guests are advised of the applicable provisions before their flight. https://t.co/rPrqJmfLfR

Twenty years ago we took off on our first flight from Basel to Zurich and have been connecting Switzerland to the world ever since. ✈️ Now we're looking back at our highlights and would like to thank you for your loyalty.🥳🎁 Find out more here: https://t.co/vptROz47D4 🍾 https://t.co/qa3jSDjT2M

Already booked a SWISS Economy ticket but want to enjoy Business Class benefits? Bid for an upgrade and decide for yourself what it is worth to you - now also on European flights. Up to 48hrs before departure, you'll find out whether it was successful: https://t.co/39LI9HoJT4 https://t.co/Wlm9JeCOWe
Our wingtip above snowy peaks – simply a perfect match 🤗✈️🗻 #repostsoftheweek #repost https://t.co/IojHZxZf6I

We’re proud to have been able to support Diamondo Earthrounding's Pacific crossing with our SWISS Mission Support. Their mission is to link initiatives accelerating sustainable aviation. Read more about the overflight and what our support looked like: https://t.co/2yPlTnkGUf https://t.co/WwkZL1c2X1
This week Saharan dust turned the sky over Zurich orange.✨✈️ #repostsoftheweek #repost https://t.co/xdmrCNpAQR

To mark today’s #InternationalWomensDay, we operated flight LX 974 from Zurich to Berlin this morning with an all-female crew in both the cockpit and the cabin. We celebrate all the inspiring, strong and fantastic women at SWISS and around the world.👩🎉#IWD2022 https://t.co/4iY3lLZWGY

data.text: It's a moment our entire SWISS Premium Economy project team has been waiting for some time: Yesterday we officially opened the inaugural flight of our new travel class in Zurich and cut the ribbon to welcome the first guests to Miami.✈️🌴#SWISSPremiumEconomy #PremiumEconomy https://t.co/kHnBAlkxLy

“Sustainable aviation fuel is the key to carbon-neutral flying, which we aim to achieve by 2050,” CEO Vranckx confirms. Together with the Lufthansa Group we have concluded a strategic collaboration @Synhelion to bring solar aviation fuel to market. #lxpressconference https://t.co/cITT7gtEms

data.text: Sustainability is a cornerstone of the SWISS transformation programme. SWISS aims to achieve its ambitious goal of halving its net carbon dioxide emissions from their 2019 levels. #lxpressconference https://t.co/42meKeUKCI
SWISS is continuously investing in its customer service and premium positioning. #lxpressconference https://t.co/vGiLHDsux9
SWISS expects to be back up to 80 per cent of its 2019 capacity this summer. #lxpressconference https://t.co/yw9rqQviVU
In 2021, SWISS operated a total of 56,372 flights and carried nearly six million passengers. #lxpressconference https://t.co/pr7VbmMoxF
Swiss WorldCargo is making a key contribution to earnings and is securing the long-haul service portfolio. #lxpressconference @SwissWorldCargo https://t.co/Z0ftU0hXqZ

“We were also able to stem the cash drain in the course of 2021 and even generate a positive cash flow for the year as a whole. And in doing so we have laid a firm and promising foundation for SWISS’s financial recovery,” Binkert adds. #lxpressconference
“The restructuring has enabled SWISS to achieve sustainable cost savings of CHF 500 million,“ explains SWISS CFO Markus Binkert. #lxpressconference https://t.co/Wj6hNOSztI

“With the transformation that we successfully embarked on in 2021, we are well equipped to remain successful in our markets,” says SWISS CEO Dieter Vranckx during the #lxpressconference. “We now need to continue our transformation.” https://t.co/I20ST8VXJg

SWISS significantly reduced its operating loss in 2021 from its prior-year level thanks to the transformation initiated, comprehensive cost-saving measures and strong cargo demand. For more info: https://t.co/FrrhSdMDLv

Together with the Lufthansa Group we have concluded a strategic collaboration with @ETH Zurich spinoff @Synhelion to bring solar aviation fuel to market. This will make us the first airline in the world to use solar kerosene. ☀️⛽️✈ #SolarFuels #Innovation #NetZero @lufthansaNews

data.text: Damien is our Instagrammer of the month on Instagram @flyswiss and takes off with you from his home base in Geneva. He will not only tell you about his dream job, but also show you the most beautiful corners of his home region in Switzerland. ✈👏

Due to the current developments, we no longer operate flights to/from Russia with immediate effect until the end of March. Affected passengers will be informed. We will also no longer use Russian airspace until further notice and continue to monitor the situation closely. https://t.co/hgwGfr5zLR

This is our new SWISS Premium Economy: enhanced comfort with a hardshell seat that reclines at no inconvenience to the guest behind, sustainable amenity kits, noise-reducing headphones, 15.6" screens, 2 pieces baggage allowance & a broader culinary choice: https://t.co/l4KAKpbudP https://t.co/YH8maD9GS2

urls.title: SWISS Premium Economy
urls.description: SWISS Premium Economy is first choice for passengers who appreciate individuality and wish to arrive at their destination feeling even more relaxed. Compared to SWISS Economy you can look forward to a latest generation seat that promises more privacy, enhanced comfort and the best entertainment at an attractive price. You will love the comfortable seat, above all due to its innovative hard-shell design. You can adjust it effortlessly without disturbing your fellow passengers in the row behind you. Enjoy

data.text: We are to become the first passenger airline in the world to take advantage of the new AeroSHARK aircraft skin technology to further reduce the carbon dioxide emissions and the fuel consumption of our flight operations. #flyswiss #AeroSHARK @BASF

urls.title: SWISS Saveurs
urls.description: With SWISS Saveurs, we offer you a wide range of culinary delicacies for every palate on most fl ights. Our new culinary concept on flights from Zurich and Geneva is a reflection of our commitment to serving you meals that are regional and delicious. The selection includes a range of healthy alternatives, is made from regional ingredients and comes in sustainable packaging whenever possible. The range of fresh products was created by Switzerland’s world-renowned Confiserie Sprüngli, which can look back

data.text: Whether veggie or not, everyone can currently enjoy the vegetarian @BeyondMeat burger with a vegan patty, Swiss mountain cheese & herb mayonnaise as part of the SWISS Saveurs menu (on longer European flights from 120 minutes). 🍔🌱🧀 More information: https://t.co/7xuC65T4G0 🍴 https://t.co/tnFfAjBO0A

data.text: What is your favourite colour of the sky? 🌈 We’re going for pink & purple this week.✨ #repostsoftheweek #repost https://t.co/zzfeuOq91U

The excitement is growing: The installation of our new Premium Economy Class is in full swing. Here you get an exclusive glimpse behind the scenes. A total of 24 Premium Economy seats are being installed, offering you more space, more comfort and more privacy in the future.💺↕️↔️ https://t.co/MyBRZpW11x

The previously known entry restrictions continue to apply: Third-country nationals from a risk state still need to be fully vaccinated to enter Switzerland. To see what rules apply to your own particular situation when entering Switzerland: https://t.co/3lTOYTha7h

data.text: From 17FEB, health-related measures for persons entering Switzerland will be lifted. It will no longer be necessary to provide proof of vaccination, recovery or a negative test nor will an entry form be required. More information: https://t.co/QBolmzgyDc. Exceptions see below: https://t.co/Y4XsRpb13r

data.text: What is a C-Check or a Vertical Stabilizer?👨🔧✈️ Our two Instagrammers of the month and aircraft engineers Pablo & Marvin answer these and other questions on Instagram @flyswiss. In February, they show you our aircraft from a new angle and have a highlight or two for you😉.
Today it's all about wingshots: a sight we can never get enough of. What about you? Share your best views with us and tag @flyswiss. ✈🇨🇭🌞#repost #repostsoftheweek https://t.co/bAAyIZxPXy
What do you prefer: sunrise or sunset? 🌄 Both make for a wonderful light. We wish you all an equally beautiful weekend and hope for a sunny sky.🌤️ #repost #repostsoftheweek https://t.co/MB9BKF52cz

More space for your hand luggage, more space in the shoulder area, an innovative lighting concept, antimicrobial surfaces in the washrooms and seats with device-friendly fold-out tables: welcome to our new @airbus A320neo Airspace Cabin. ✈🧳💺 #A320neo #AirspaceCabin #Airbus

data.text: From 22 January, persons who are vaccinated or have recovered from COVID no longer need to present a negative PCR or rapid antigen test to enter Switzerland. Persons who are not vaccinated or who have not recovered still need a test to enter. More info: https://t.co/3WnC5nFACb https://t.co/LTvrttDi1J

Our flight attendant Desirée literally takes-off into the new year with you. 🎉 As Instagrammer of the month in January, she shows you her best moments up in the air and tells you why she loves distributing chocolate to our guests 😉 Follow her on Instagram @flyswiss.

data.text: On 02 January, Matt and Robin, two young aviation enthusiasts, will take off at @zrh_airport to a flight around the world with the mission, to promote initiatives accelerating aviation's path into a more sustainable future. We're proud to support them: https://t.co/g3G6AqaS3P https://t.co/IFlTolojuE
💛✨🌟⭐️🎄We wish you a radiant Christmas and sparkling days with your loved ones. 🎄⭐️ 🌟 ✨💛 https://t.co/jRWxTaZMw0

Teamwork makes a dream work: True to this motto, our crew and technicians made a fantasy come true in the middle of the night at @zrh_airport 🌟⭐️💫
With this magic of lights, we wish you happy holidays, a peaceful time with your loved ones and, of course, good health 💛🙏 https://t.co/iBZCP9J34R
We're getting ready to fly you into the fourth Advent weekend ✈️ Lay back and relax 🍪☕️🕯 https://t.co/rSFCDTQgh6

On Dec 14th, we celebrated the reopening of the GVA-JFK route. The reopening also coincided with the opening of the much anticipated East Wing building at @GeneveAeroport. We serve Geneva-New York with four weekly direct flights. https://t.co/OnGrUuZIg1

We further expand our network for summer 2022 and will be adding 6 new destinations to our European route network. From Zurich we´ll serve Bologna, Nantes, Sofia, Odessa and Vilnius, while Geneva will see the addition of a new Brussels service. Learn more: https://t.co/HK0igT9455 https://t.co/NBzKtV3fKe
What comes to our mind at this sight? “❤️ is in the air…✈️” 😉Have a lovely weekend. #repost #repostsoftheweek https://t.co/HlTPblp7rz

HO HO HO... who was travelling in one of our sledges today for a surprise😉? At airy heights,🎅handed out a typical Swiss Santa Claus treat to our well-behaved guests, who were amazed by his new workplace😆. #santaonboard https://t.co/aAt889Pqgy

data.text: We successfully commenced our first-ever non-stop service between Zurich and Beirut🇨🇭🇱🇧. The first eastbound LX222 flight took off from Zurich yesterday at 07:34 CET and touched down in the Lebanese capital at 12:09 CET. Beirut will receive up to twice-weekly service from Zurich. https://t.co/H3c0aHTWlJ

Travel News: SWISS welcomes the Swiss Federal Council’s decision to lift its present quarantine requirement for all countries with effect from 4 December. SWISS supports all actions to make travel safe during the present pandemic - increased testing can make a major contribution. https://t.co/sWWCnWV6C2

Don't we have one of the most beautiful home bases? 😇✈🛫🛬
#repost #repostsoftheweek @zrh_airport https://t.co/6upfX1dSyv

Former flight attendant, plane spotter and currently our youngest pilot: Leonard, A320 First Officer, lives for aviation ✈. In December, he shares his passion with you on Instagram @flyswiss and explains a lot of things you probably didn't know before 😉

data.text: Travel faces us again with new challenges and many questions these days. We therefore do our utmost to process your request as quickly as possible. However, in case of longer waiting times, we ask for your understanding. Most important travel information: https://t.co/OIo8IvFn4M https://t.co/T8dZYlHsOo

Bye Bye HB-IJE ✈️👋 By 2026, we'll have retired a total of 21 short-haul aircraft, replacing them with more fuel-efficient A320/321neos. In this context, a 26-year-old A320 recently left us. Find out more about the preparations for an aircraft phase out on our blog:
🌎🌍🌏🔭The view through the window to the world: We never get enough of it. Do you? 😎 https://t.co/hPYfZ5idMl

❤️Congratulations for the ticket to the World Cup @nati_sfv_asf 🥳🙌⚽️As the official airline partner of the Swiss national football team, we are more than proud: 2022 here we come✈️#hoppschwiiz 🇨🇭#WorldCup https://t.co/adPrK6Taaw

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text: It's obvious: autumn is here and provides a spectacular scenery🍂✈️🍁 We wish you a cosy weekend🤗 https://t.co/FxkEddhZO5

Melt away: Have you ever enjoyed a fondue at an altitude of 10,000 metres🫕? You can now make your dream of the highest🧀fondue indulgence in the world come true on board our longer European flights. Check out more highlights of our new SWISS Saveurs menu: https://t.co/fGS32JputV https://t.co/ehDLyVMXzu

With the seasonally stronger summer months and sizeable cost savings, we were able to achieve a marginally positive Adjusted EBIT of CHF 6.7 million for the third quarter of 2021. More info: https://t.co/QPRoo3ohjT

After one year and a half we have reinstalled the Economy Class seats in our last of three "Cargo" Boeing 777-300ER. At the peak of the pandemic, we have removed those seats in order to transport more medical cargo, not only in the belly but also in the passenger cabin.💺➡️📦➡️💺 https://t.co/4IRu1CQv4h

data.text: Are you a 🧀-lover? A vegetarian, a vegan, someone health-conscious, a 🍔-fan or do you have a sweet tooth? Then check out the highlights of our new SWISS Saveurs menu. Our favourite: the original Swiss fondue 🫕. What's yours? https://t.co/fGS32JH5Sv https://t.co/L6OAGtPgKV

data.text: They spend almost more time in the hangar than at home: our two Instagrammers of the month and future aircraft engineers Lars and Laurin. In November, they introduce you to the extraordinary world of aircraft maintenance on Instagram @flyswiss.

data.text: Boo - the ghosts are out👻: we wish you a spooky Halloween 🦇 🎃  #happyhalloween https://t.co/60Um91yYzs

entity.name: Halloween
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations for Halloween for all years

data.text: Thumbs up for the great shots from our fantastic community👍 Which photo do you like best?🤩 https://t.co/KC87PD60VA
Do you also prefer window seats? 😉💺 Show us your best wingshot and dream yourself away ☀️✈☁️ Happy weekend🥳 #wingshot #weekend #flyaway #flyswiss https://t.co/vznUeTdgl9

The date is set - the countdown is on: From 8 November, vaccinated travelers can fly to the USA again.🛫🔜🇺🇸 
Further information: https://t.co/QfP8N9HXDN #GrüeziUSA https://t.co/sWwnOFsgke
Seat belt: fastened. Engines: running. Relaxation mode: on. Enjoy your weekend ✈️ https://t.co/jjkbOAklMR

Marhaba Beirut - Hello Beirut 👋 We will launch our first-ever non-stop service between Zurich and the Lebanese capital of Beirut on 2 December🇨🇭🔜🇱🇧. Lebanon’s economic and cultural centre will receive two flights a week. More info: https://t.co/rV8VHjiUBc
Ready, steady… take-off into the weekend ☁️🛫☁️ Let your thoughts fly away. https://t.co/Xg3jDYgexj

Take two minutes and answer four questions about how your attitude towards air travel has changed in recent times, especially if you haven't flown for a while 📝: https://t.co/eticEHLOcM https://t.co/qEyDIHKYeL

data.text: Two worlds, many things in common: With @Breitling we share a passion for aviation, Swiss quality & precision. We celebrate this partnership in two Navitimer 8 Limited Editions, which are also available here on ground: https://t.co/hU2iymVI0y. Immerse here:https://t.co/hlWetfwNhr

Today the United Nations World Data Forum 2021 (UNWDF) starts in Bern.📊🗺️💻 It's organised in accordance with the sustainability principles of the 2030 Agenda and we're proud to be the Official Carrier of the UNWDF. ✈️More: @Road2Bern & https://t.co/dUncvJ4q7W #UNWDF2021 #SDGs https://t.co/IEgJBWS9Tz

data.text: Enjoy the weekend – no matter if above or below the clouds 🤩✈️ https://t.co/9Ck7vn1jYH

Happy World Vegetarian Day💚Enjoy our vegetarian dishes on your next flight. On long-haul you find dishes created by @hiltl, the oldest vegetarian restaurant in the world and on short-haul you can choose a freshly made Veggie Brioche Burger by @spruengli_ and other veggie snacks. https://t.co/BGF8rXfgAC
